snippet.title: Half Sword Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Some exclusive - and, impressively, entirely blood-free - gameplay from upcoming physics-based medieval combat simulator Half Sword,  in which you can wield historically accurate fifteenth-century arms against period-correct armour.

Wishlist it today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2397300

#convergenceshow #indiegame
